member.summary: Dependencyproperty DesignCulture to set the Culture. Only supported at DesignTime.

member.summary: Static Constructor

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeDictionary.GetAssemblyName(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Returns the AssemblyName of the passed assembly instance
member.param: The Assembly where to get the name from
member.returns: The Assembly name

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeDictionary.GetIsInDesignMode
member.summary: Gets the status of the Application.Current.MainWindow designmode
member.returns: TRUE if in design mode, else FALSE

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeDictionary.ResourceKeyExists(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Looks up the ResourceManagers for the searched resourceKey in the ResourceDictionary in the ResourceAssembly with an Invariant Culture.
member.param: The resource assembly (e.g.: LocalizeExtension). NULL = Name of the executing assembly
The dictionary to look up (e.g.: ResHelp, Resources, ...). NULL = Name of the default resource file (Resources)
The key of the searched entry (e.g.: btnHelp, Cancel, ...). NULL = Exception
member.returns: TRUE if the searched one is found, otherwise FALSE
member.exception: If the ResourceManagers cannot be looked up
If the searched ResourceManager wasnt found (only in runtime)
If the resourceKey is null or empty

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeDictionary.ResourceKeyExists(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Looks up the ResourceManagers for the searched resourceKey in the ResourceDictionary in the ResourceAssembly with the passed culture. If the searched one does not exists with the passed culture, is will searched until the invariant culture is used.
member.param: The resource assembly (e.g.: LocalizeExtension). NULL = Name of the executing assembly
The dictionary to look up (e.g.: ResHelp, Resources, ...). NULL = Name of the default resource file (Resources)
The key of the searched entry (e.g.: btnHelp, Cancel, ...). NULL = Exception
member.returns: TRUE if the searched one is found, otherwise FALSE
member.exception: If the ResourceManagers cannot be looked up
If the searched ResourceManager wasnt found (only in runtime)
If the resourceKey is null or empty

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeDictionary.GetResourceManager(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Looks up in the cached ResourceManager list for the searched ResourceManager.
member.param: The resource assembly (e.g.: LocalizeExtension). NULL = Name of the executing assembly
The dictionary to look up (e.g.: ResHelp, Resources, ...). NULL = Name of the default resource file (Resources)
The key of the searched entry (e.g.: btnHelp, Cancel, ...). NULL = Exception
member.returns: The founded ResourceManager
member.exception: If the ResourceManagers cannot be looked up
If the searched ResourceManager wasnt found
If the resourceKey is null or empty

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeDictionary.GetLocizedObject``1(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Returns an object from the passed dictionary with the given name. If a wrong TType is passed, no exception will get thrown (return obj as TType).
member.typeparam: Type of resulttype. Have to be a class.
member.param: The Assembly where the Resource is located at
Name of the resource directory
The key for the resource
The culture to get the right content
member.returns: The founded object or NULL if not found or wront TType is given
member.exception: resourceDictionary is null
resourceDictionary is empty
resourceName is null
resourceName is empty
Ambiguous resourcename {resourceDictionary}
No resource with name '{resourceDictionary}' founded

member.summary: Gets the top most parent of an DependencyObject and returns it.
member.param: The DependencyObject to get the top most parent from
member.returns: The top most parent of the passed DependencyObject

member.name: P:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeDictionary.Instance
member.summary: Provides the singleton. If the underlying instance is null, a instance will be created.

member.name: P:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeDictionary.DefaultCultureInfo
member.summary: Holds the default CultureInfo to initialize the LocalizeDictionary.CultureInfo

member.name: P:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeDictionary.Culture
member.summary: Gets / sets the CultureInfo for localization. On set, OnCultureChanged is raised.
member.exception: You have to set LocDictionary.Culture first or wait until System.Windows.Application.Current.MainWindow is created. Otherwise you will get an Exception.
thrown if Culture will be set to null

member.name: P:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeDictionary.SpecificCulture
member.summary: Gets the Specific CultureInfo of the current culture. This can be used for format manners. If the Culture is an invariant CultureInfo, SpecificCulture will also return an invalriant CultureInfo.

member.summary: Get raised if the LocDictionary.Culture is changed.

member.summary: Holds the used ResourceManagers with their coresponding namespaces

member.summary: Adds an listener to the inner list of listeners

member.summary: Removes an listener from the inner list of listeners

member.summary: Indicates, if the current instance is listening on the source event

member.summary: Creates a new instance of WeakCultureChangedEventManager

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeDictionary.WeakCultureChangedEventManager.StartStopListening
member.summary: This method starts and stops the listening process by attaching/detaching on the source event

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeDictionary.WeakCultureChangedEventManager.StartListening(System.Object)
member.summary: This method starts the listening process by attaching on the source event

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeDictionary.WeakCultureChangedEventManager.StopListening(System.Object)
member.summary: This method stops the listening process by detaching on the source event

member.name: T:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeExtension
member.summary: Represents a LocalizationExtension which provides a localized object of a .resx dictionary
member.remarks: If a content between two tags in xaml is set, this has the higher priority and will overwrite the setted properties

member.name: F:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeExtension.id
member.summary: Holds the unique id for this instance. This is only used for better debugging.

member.name: F:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeExtension.m_Dict
member.summary: Holds the Name of the .resx dictionary. If it's null, "Resources" will get returned

member.name: F:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeExtension.m_Assembly
member.summary: Holds the name of the Assembly where the .resx is located

member.name: F:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeExtension.m_Key
member.summary: Holds the Key to a .resx object

member.name: F:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeExtension.m_TargetObjects
member.summary: Holds the collection of assigned dependency objects as WeakReferences

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeExtension.#ctor
member.summary: Initialize the LocalizeExtension

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeExtension.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initialize the LocalizeExtension
member.remarks: This constructor register the Eventhandler OnCultureChanged on LocalizeDictionary to get an aknowledge of changing the culture
member.param: Three types are supported: Direct: passed key = key; Dict/Key pair: this have to be seperated like ResXDictionaryName:ResourceKey Assembly/Dict/Key pair: this have to be seperated like ResXDictionaryName:ResourceKey

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeExtension.GetForcedCultureOrDefault
member.summary: If Culture property defines a valid CultureInfo, a CultureInfo instance will get created and returned, otherwise LocalizeDictionary.Culture will get returned.
member.returns: The CultureInfo
member.exception: thrown if the parameter Culture dont defines a valid CultureInfo

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeExtension.SetNewValue(System.Object)
member.summary: Set the Value of the DependencyProperty to the passed Value
member.param: The new Value

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeExtension.ProvideValue(System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Provides the Value for the first Binding
member.remarks:
This method register the Eventhandler OnCultureChanged on LocalizeDictionary to get an aknowledge of changing the culture, if the passed TargetObjects type of DependencyObject.
!PROOF: On every single UserControl, Window, and Page, there is a new SparedDP reference, and so there is every time a new LocalizeExtension! Because of this, we dont need to notify every single DependencyObjects to update their value (for GC).
member.param: The provided from the MarkupExtension
member.returns: The founded item from the .resx directory or null if not founded
member.exception: thrown if is not type of

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeExtension.SetBinding(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.DependencyProperty)
member.summary: Sets a binding between a DependencyObject with its DependencyProperty and this LocalizeExtension
member.param: The target dependency object
The target dependency property
member.returns: TRUE if the binding was setup successfully, otherwise FALSE (Binding already exists).

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeExtension.FormatOutput(System.Object)
member.summary: This method is used to modify the passed object into the target format
member.param: The object that will be modified
member.returns: Returns the modified object

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeExtension.HandleNewValue
member.summary: This method gets the new value for the target property and call SetNewValue.

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocalizeExtension.System#Windows#IWeakEventListener#ReceiveWeakEvent(System.Type,System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This method will be called through the interface, passed to the LocalizeDictionary.WeakCultureChangedEventManager to get notifyed on culture changed

member.summary: This destructor only exists fr debug reasons

member.summary: Holds the name of the Assembly where the .resx is located. If it's null, the executing assembly (where this LocalizeEngine is located at) will get returned

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocText.GetAppendText(RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocText.AppendType)
member.summary: Returns the prefix or suffix text, depending on the supplied AppendType. If the prefix or suffix is null or empty, the space option will be ignored.
member.param: The AppendType defindes the format of the return value
member.returns: Returns the formated prefix or suffix

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocText.FormatText(System.String)
member.summary: This method formats the localized text. If the passed target text is null, string.empty will be returned.
member.param: The text to format.
member.returns: Returns the formated text or string.empty, if the target text was null.

member.summary: Provides the Value for the first Binding as

member.returns: The founded item from the .resx directory or null if not founded
member.exception: thrown if is not type of
thrown if the founded object is not type of

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocText.FormatOutput(System.Object)
member.summary: This method returns the finished formatted text
member.param: If the passed string not null, it will be used, otherwise a fresh localized text will be loaded.
member.returns: Returns the finished formatted text in format [PREFIX[SPACE]]LocalizedText[[SPACE]SUFFIX]

member.name: P:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.LocText.SuffixSpace
member.summary: Defines, if a space should be added between the suffix and the localized text or not

member.name: T:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.ObjectDependencyManager
member.summary: This class ensures, that a specific object lives as long a associated object is alive.

member.name: F:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.ObjectDependencyManager.InternalList
member.summary: This member holds the list of all weakreferences and their appropriate objects.

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.ObjectDependencyManager.#cctor
member.summary: Static Constructor. Creates a new instance of Dictionary<object, WeakReference> and set it to InernalList.

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.ObjectDependencyManager.AddObjectDependency(System.WeakReference,System.Object)
member.summary: This method adds a new object dependency
member.param: The WeakReference, which ensures the live cycle of
The object, which should stay alive as long is alive
member.returns: true, if the binding was successfully, otherwise false
member.exception: The objToHold cannot be null
objToHold cannot be type of WeakReference
The WeakReference.Target cannot be the same as objToHold

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.ObjectDependencyManager.CleanUp
member.summary: This method cleans up all independent (!WeakReference.IsAlive) objects.

member.name: M:RootLibrary.WPF.Localization.ObjectDependencyManager.CleanUp(System.Object)
member.summary: This method cleans up all independent (!WeakReference.IsAlive) objects or a single object.
member.param: If defined, the associated object dependency will be removed instead of a full CleanUp
